channel.title: 508 how to make owner/co and hiddens when in rights?
channel.description: how do i do this new to 508s please help

item.title: 508 how to make owner/co and hiddens when in rights?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t think a 508 has yet to introduce these features. I might eventually make tutorial on it though.

If you know what you’re doing:
Change the rights byte sent on login
Change permissions for commands, items etc

All in all it would take about 5 minutes, but I don’t really feel like spending the time at the moment to explain all of the code.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 how to make owner/co and hiddens when in rights?
